title: The Agrarian revolution
creator_credit: W. Hugh Baddeley and Hugh Baddeley Productions
brief_description: Deals with the enclosure of common lands, one of the most dramatic happenings in British history, and describes the changes in agriculture over the last two hundred and fifty years. Commentary by spoken by Dick Graham.
